mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( gitAccountId, username, password, gitName, gitBio, accountName, token, createTime, updateTime, avatarUrl ) VALUES( #{gitAccountId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{gitName}, #{gitBio}, #{accountName}, #{token}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{avatarUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT gitAccountId FROM user where gitAccountId=#{gitAccountId}
mapper.update: update user set gitAccountId=#{gitAccountId}, username=#{username}, gitName=#{gitName}, gitBio=#{gitBio}, accountName=#{accountName}, token=#{token}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, avatarUrl=#{avatarUrl} where id=#{id}
